"Intel Pod":
"Have you come across any hostiles with special
names yet? They usually look more powerful
than the regular kind."

"I'm betting they're as tough as they look.
They also seem to boost the morale of other
hostiles around them, making them stronger."

"仰々しいお名前のついたエネミー
見たことありますかー？
強そうなエネミーにつくんですー。"

"強力だからでしょうねー。
周りのエネミーもテンション上げて
強くなったりするんですよー。"
